thread.title: Area bowling for Oct. 16

author: buffalonews
title: Area bowling for Oct. 16
text:
Area bowling
ABBOTT: Thursday Seniors — Don Klosin 255, Gordon Geisendorf 254.
AIRPORT: Debra Ervin 742, Connie McMillan 264-268–733, Jayson Moore 300, John Bridges Jr. 299–762, Ricky Zinone 760, Omar Fowler 290–736, Mike Zarcone 734. Cheektowaga Firemen — Andy Rogacki 276-708.
BRAD ANGELO: Midnight Bombers — Terry Bennetti 279-732, Kevin Ryan 279-697.

MANOR: Not Just Tonawanda Firemen — Kyle Doody 279-758, Dale Geiger 255.
MANOR 2: N. Presbyterian — Chris Fecio 277-720, B.J. Dranko 267-708. Wilber Wright Memorial — Bob Handly 676, Rick Kinder 250. Bell/Arc — Jon Novak 278-777, Dennis Illig 278-704, Jeff Husarek 254-701, Joe Moley 258-694, George Decker 279-690.

Memorial — Louis Scapillato 299-267-793, Lou Scapillato 266-741, Vinny Pascuzzi 269-715, Joe Dirienzo 266, Spencer Lajoy 257-689.
